statements: UPDATE protected_zones SET boundary_polygon = ST_SetSRID('POLYGON((-122.358 47.839,-122.347 47.822,-122.28 47.841,-122.313 47.858,-122.358 47.839))'::geometry, 4326) WHERE id = 1;

UPDATE protected_zones SET zone_name = 'Residential Area', boundary_polygon = ST_SetSRID('POLYGON((-122.358 47.839,-122.347 47.822,-122.28 47.841,-122.313 47.858,-122.358 47.839))'::geometry, 4326 WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE protected_zones SET boundary_polygon = ST_GeomFromText('POLYGON((0 0, 0 5, 5 5, 5 0, 0 0))') WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE protected_zones SET zone_name = 'Restricted Area', boundary_polygon = ST_GeomFromText('POLYGON((10 10, 10 15, 15 15, 15 10, 10 10))') WHERE zone_name = 'Public Access Zone';
UPDATE protected_zones SET zone_description = 'Updated description' WHERE zone_id = 1;
UPDATE zone_boundaries SET boundary_coordinates = ST_GeomFromText('POINT(37.7749 -122.4194)', 4326) WHERE zone_id = 1;
UPDATE protected_zones SET zone_name = 'Restricted Zone 1', zone_description = 'This zone is restricted' WHERE zone_id = 1;
UPDATE zone_boundaries SET boundary_coordinates = 'POLYGON((0 0, 0 5, 5 5, 5 0, 0 0))' WHERE boundary_id = 1;
UPDATE protected_zones SET zone_name='Restricted Area A', zone_description='This is a restricted zone.' WHERE zone_id=1;
UPDATE zone_boundaries SET boundary_point=ST_GeomFromText('POINT(1 1)', 4326) WHERE zone_id=2;
UPDATE protected_zones SET zone_name = 'Updated Zone 1', zone_description = 'New Description' WHERE zone_id = 1;
UPDATE zone_restrictions SET restriction_type = 'Updated Type', restriction_details = 'Updated Details' WHERE restriction_id = 2;
UPDATE protected_zones SET zone_name = 'Restricted Area 1' WHERE zone_id = 1;
UPDATE zone_activities SET activity_description = 'Bird watching and hiking' WHERE activity_id = 3;
UPDATE protected_zones SET zone_name = 'Updated Protected Zone Name' WHERE zone_id = 1;
UPDATE zone_activities SET activity_description = 'New description for the activity' WHERE zone_id = 3 AND activity_type = 'Hiking';
UPDATE protected_environment_zones SET zone_name = 'New Zone Name' WHERE zone_id = 1;
UPDATE zone_activities SET activity_type = 'Hiking' WHERE activity_id = 3;
UPDATE protected_environment_zones SET boundaries = 'POLYGON((0 0, 0 10, 10 10, 10 0, 0 0))' WHERE zone_id = 1;
UPDATE zone_activities SET activity_type = 'Adventure' WHERE zone_id = 2 AND activity_name = 'Hiking';
